content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: BatchDeleteMonitors path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/monitors/batch_delete content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete multiple monitors
reqbody
v2batchdeletemonitorsrequest
type obj
monitorids
type str
desc the list of monitor ids to delete
required true
responses
title: 14_Monitors_BatchDeleteMonitors_74.json
